name: LOL [Last of Light]
description:
Before reading this description, please try out Slavun5's game!

 - https://slavun5.itch.io/cardmaster2

He created a fantastic project, but for some reason, he couldn't send Jame Gam #26

I made this game for Jame Gam #26 (I know that this game is the worst you could play ever, but I just tried, also it's my first game jam and first experience in the Godot game engine)

I hope, it has at least a little bit of potential

Thanks to DorNell8 for the design and ideas!

Controls:

W / Up - Go up

S / Left Shift / Right Shift - Go down

D / Right - Go right

A / Left - Go left

Left mouse / Q - Fire

Also, you have the secret keycode, try to find it!
